information: RATEC is an international cross-sector manufacturer of components for the bulk handling industry. Having originated from a traditional engineering office for mechanical and plant engineering, RATEC is currently engaged in the development and sale of components for bulk material technology and extraction technology. Many years of experience and comprehensive knowledge make RATEC a competent service provider and development partner for new solutions, improvements and innovations. In cooperation with internationally active engineering firms and customers, new products are constantly being developed and existing products further developed and improved. In addition to the standardised sales range, RATEC also develops and manufactures special solutions ranging from individual items to small batches at the St. Veit an der Glan site.
